001package net.tvburger.jdl.mlp;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetwork;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers.NeuralNetworkInitializer;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers.XavierInitializer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers.NeuralNetworkOptimizers;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
015import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.GradientDescentOptimizer;
016import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
017import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.EpochRegime;
018import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
019import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.RegularizationFactory;
020import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.Regularizations;
021import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.listeners.EpochRmePlotter;
022
023import java.util.Arrays;
024import java.util.Random;
025
026public class MLPLineMain {
027
028    public static void main(String[] args) {
029        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<Float> line = SyntheticDataSets.line(-10.0f, 20.0f, JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
030        line.setNoiseScale(1.0f);
031        DataSet<Float> dataSet = line.load();
032        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.resample(20, new Random());
033        DataSet<Float> testSet = dataSet.resample(20, new Random());
034//        MultiLayerPerceptron mlp = MultiLayerPerceptron.create(Activations.linear(), Activations.linear(), 1, 2, 1);
035        MultiLayerPerceptron mlp = MultiLayerPerceptron.create(Activations.linear(), Activations.linear(), 1, 1);
036
037        NeuralNetworkInitializer initializer = new XavierInitializer();
038        ObjectiveFunction<Float> objective = Objectives.mSE(JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
039        RegularizationFactory<Float> factory = Regularizations.getFactory(JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
040//        objective.addRegularization(factory.createElasticNet(0.5f, 0.001f));
041        GradientDescentOptimizer<NeuralNetwork, Float> optimizer = NeuralNetworkOptimizers.vanilla(0.001f);
042        EpochRmePlotter epochRmePlotter = new EpochRmePlotter();
043        epochRmePlotter.display();
044        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.epochs(100_000,
045                        EpochRegime.sample(250, epochRmePlotter.attach("Training Set (" + trainingSet.size() + ")")),
046                        EpochRegime.sample(250, epochRmePlotter.attach("Test Set (" + testSet.size() + ")", testSet)))
047                .batch();
048        Trainer<MultiLayerPerceptron, Float> mlpTrainer = Trainer.of(initializer, objective, optimizer, regime);
049        mlpTrainer.train(mlp, trainingSet);
050
051        NeuralNetworks.dump(mlp);
052
053        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : testSet) {
054            Float[] estimate = mlp.estimate(sample.features());
055            System.out.println("with noise = " + Arrays.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " estimated = " + Arrays.toString(estimate) + " real = " + Arrays.toString(line.getEstimationFunction().estimate(sample.features())));
056        }
057    }
058}
